TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. An asteroid strike breaks all streaks.

iVish.

Granted: You are now Irish with a lisp.

I wish I could rant.

Granted, but there's no appropriate thread for it.

I wish for a universal megathread.

Granted, but it's so chaotic as to be completely useless for discussing anything.

I wish I could visit Mars.

You are instantly transported to Mars as you are now, then get to experience massive decompression first hand.

I wish for a magic door.

Granted. It magically beats your fingers, so you can't use your magic stick.

I wish for Ring of Power, to power my phone.

Granted, but it does so by taking all the power from.every other phone in the world.

I wish I was Steve Harvey.

Granted. You were. Until that brick from the sky. Now you are John Doe.

I wish to take that 0.33333(3) orange behind me.

Granted: You take a third of the orange. Now it looks like Pac Man. It comes to life and chews you to death.

I wish for someone who likes making internals.

Granted. This person is called a surgeon.

I wish the swap file here was controllable.

Granted: It is, but not by you.

I wish for the best of KSP 1 with the greatest mods included and all bugs fixed, to be released as KSP 1.5

Granted. You are dressed for success.

I wish the unfinished Hangar mod was finalized for 1.12.5.

Granted, but it has dependencies that will never be finished.

I wish KSP1 would get an update to make it 1.12.6.

Granted, but the update turns it into Minecraft.

I wish my potato could run KSP2 at 60 fps.

Granted. But you have suddenly eaten it by mistake.

I wish they had upgraded the GMO potatoe CPU in the foodstock.

Granted: But it gets chopped up and deep fried.

I wish I knew what I was doing.

Granted. Now you feel twice guilty.

I wish to update the wish list.

Granted. The wish list is now updated to the 5th dimension, where only the bulk beings can access it.

I wish for a potato pc.

Granted. But the potato who previously owned the PC is angry and starts chasing you.

I wish for a French fry PC.

Granted:

I wish I could remember things when I need to.

Granted, but you never need to.

I wish I had a PC that could run KSP2 at max graphics at 120 fps.

Granted. Overjoyed, you attempt to test your PC's limits and launch a 1000 part vessel. Your PC then unceremoniously combusts.

I wish for a real life ALT + F12 menu.

Granted, but it only gives you the option to give your body an endless stream of liquid methane, liquid oxygen, or xenon. Your choice.

I wish I could visit the Apollo landing sites on the Moon.

Granted, but you must crash into the moon to see it.

I wish for pay-to-win systems in video games to begone forever.

Granted, but all games are removed with them.

I wish for KSP2 to have no more bugs forever.
